name: Shapetropy
description:
Shapetropy is a fast paced arcade score chaser where each round lasts only one minute. Each time a shape bounces off a wall you earn a point. Having many shapes earns you many points, but also makes it more likely a cube will be created in the chaos. And that means game over.

HOW TO PLAY
  • Create and aim lines with left mouse button
  • Shapes bounce off walls and eachother
  • Shapes combine to make advanced shapes
  • Rectangles combine into cubes, so watch out
  • Slow down a shape to control the chaos by hovering the mouse cursor over it
  • When the 60 seconds run out or a cube is created, the round is over
